message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product at a price that I think is fair considering its value to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1100000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, but I believe the product's value to you is closer to its worth to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1000000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I understand that you're still a bit above your budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to compromise, so I'm counteroffering at $990000. This is my final offer, and I'm confident you'll find it reasonable.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $980000 for the product. This is my final offer as well.

I'm surprised you're willing to go up to $980000, but I'm still not willing to sell the product at that price. I'm willing to meet you at $1050000, which is the lowest price I'm willing to accept. This is my final offer.
